GisGml212Schema
CreateReader

static GIS_API GisXmlReader* GisGml212Schema::CreateReader (   )  [static]
 

Constructs an GML 2.1.2 schema reader. This reader reads an XML document containing the GML 2.1.2 and Xlinks schemas.

Returns:
Returns GisXmlReader
